Quick Start Guide

Getting Started

  • Start with the Integrated Dashboard for full monitoring
  • Ensure monitor server is running on port 8765
  • Dashboards auto-connect to WebSocket server
  • Use keyboard shortcuts for navigation (? for help)

Connection Setup

  • Default WebSocket port: 8765
  • Auto-reconnect enabled on all dashboards
  • Check connection status in top bar
  • Manual reconnect available if needed

Dashboard Types

  • Production: Stable, fully-featured dashboards
  • Development: Beta features and new UI
  • Legacy: Original vanilla JS implementations
  • Archive: Test files and experiments
